privacy_and_confidentiality_of_informati: We appreciate your concerns and your interest in the privacy of your data on the Internet. This policy has been prepared to help you understand the nature of the data that we collect from you when you visit our website and how we deal with this personal data.
browsing_desc: We have not used this content to collect your personal data from your computer while browsing for this, but only the data provided by you will be used with your knowledge and of your own free will.
disclosure_of_information_decs: We have not used this content to collect your personal data from your computer while browsing for this, but only the data provided by you will be used with your knowledge and of your own free will or desirable to comply with the law, or to defend or protect the property rights of this site or the beneficiaries of it
data_necessary_to_carry_out_the_transact: Data necessary to carry out the transactions requested by you

When we need any of your data, we will ask you to provide it of your own free will. As this information will help us in contacting you and carrying out your requests, wherever possible. The data provided by you will never be sold to any third party for the purpose of marketing it for his own benefit without obtaining your prior and written consent unless this is done on the basis that it is part of collective data used for statistical purposes and research without including any data that can be used to identify you.
when_you_call_us_desc: All data provided by you will be treated as confidential. The forms that are submitted directly on the network require providing data that will help us improve our site. The data provided by you will be used to respond to all your inquiries, comments, or requests by this site or any of its affiliated sites
amendments_to_the_policy_of_confidential: Amendments to the policy of confidentiality and privacy of information

We reserve the right to amend the terms and conditions of the confidentiality policy and the privacy of information if necessary and when appropriate. Amendments will be implemented here or on the main privacy policy page, and you will be continuously notified of the data that we have obtained, how we will use it and who will provide it with this data
contact_us_desc: You can contact us when needed by clicking on the Contact Us link available in our website links or sending to our e-mail
finally_desc: Your concerns and concerns about the confidentiality and privacy of data is a very important issue for us. We hope this will be achieved through this policy
about_spetaliaa:
Aesttalia is a leading platform for providing electronic health care services to patients, and organizing clinic management for doctors in Egypt

  You can now view an evaluation of doctors of all specialties with a high degree of accuracy and efficiency, proven by the platform; Search and compare a selection of doctors and book online with the nearest doctor, clinic or hospital
contact_us_desc_page: Feel free to contact us for any information
